sentence: The resolution is cosponsored by every woman senator on the Judiciary Committee-- Mazie Hirono (D-Hawaii), Kamala Harris (D-Calif.), Joni Ernst (R-Iowa) and Marsha Blackburn (R-Tenn.)--as well as Senators Thom Tillis (R-N.C.) and Mike Crapo (R-Idaho).
